Name: Konami Classics Vol. 2
Overview:
Konami Classics Vol. 2 is a retail collection of three classic Konami games that were previously released as Xbox Live Arcade titles. Rather than registering as a single title, each game operates as an individual XBLA game with its own achievements. The included games are:

Contra
Rush'n Attack
Track & Field

The overall package features Xbox 360 achievements, downloadable content, online multiplayer (for up to four players where applicable), offline co-op gameplay, and offline multiplayer (again, for up to four players where applicable). Each title features online leaderboards.
